blogPost.title: What are your day-to-day duties as President of Wesleyan University? Answer by @mroth78, 16th president @wesleyan_u. https://t.co/XrdWQ3o22Q https://t.co/B92Zt5CPFS
blogPost.author: Quora

localize.full_text: ウェスリアン大学の学長としての日常業務はどのようなものですか？Answer by @mroth78, 16th president @wesleyan_u. https://t.co/XrdWQ3o22Q https://t.co/B92Zt5CPFS
你作为卫斯理大学校长的日常工作是什么？由 @mroth78, 16th president @wesleyan_u. https://t.co/XrdWQ3o22Q https://t.co/B92Zt5CPFS 回答
你作爲衛斯理大學校長的日常工作是什麼？由 @mroth78, 16th president @wesleyan_u. https://t.co/XrdWQ3o22Q https://t.co/B92Zt5CPFS 回答

previous.title: How can you identify anti-mentors and use tactics to change the power dynamic? Answer by @ElizaVancort, Author: A Woman's Guide to Claiming Space: Stand Tall Raise Your Voice Be Heard. https://t.co/vyYONyfJ7y https://t.co/Hv59SIFnrB

localize.full_text: アンチメンターを見極め、力関係を変える戦術をとるにはどうすればいいか？回答者：@ElizaVancort（著者）。A Woman's Guide to Claiming Space: Stand Tall Raise Your Voice Be Heard. https://t.co/vyYONyfJ7y https://t.co/Hv59SIFnrB
如何识别反辅导员并使用战术来改变权力动态？回答者：@ElizaVancort，作者。一个女人主张空间的指南。站在高处，提高你的声音被听到。https://t.co/vyYONyfJ7y https://t.co/Hv59SIFnrB
如何識別反輔導員並使用戰術來改變權力動態？回答者：@ElizaVancort，作者。一個女人主張空間的指南。站在高處，提高你的聲音被聽到。https://t.co/vyYONyfJ7y https://t.co/Hv59SIFnrB

next.title: What factors do you have in mind when designing a product for parents? Answer by @annekate, Co-founder & CPO of @Winnie. https://t.co/eXI2a19IqG https://t.co/dhuzazuhhI

localize.full_text: 保護者向けの製品をデザインする際、どのような要素を考慮していますか？Answer by @annekate, Co-founder & CPO of @Winnie. https://t.co/eXI2a19IqG https://t.co/dhuzazuhhI
在为父母设计产品时，你会考虑到哪些因素？回答者：@annekate，联合创始人& CPO of @Winnie. https://t.co/eXI2a19IqG https://t.co/dhuzazuhhI
在爲父母設計產品時，你會考慮到哪些因素？回答者：@annekate，聯合創始人& CPO of @Winnie. https://t.co/eXI2a19IqG https://t.co/dhuzazuhhI
